title: Two Democratic lawmakers shot along with their spouses in their Minnesota homes; one couple dead
subhead: State representative Melissa Hortman and her husband Mark were killed at their home near Minneapolis, Governor Tim Walz told a press conference. State senator John Hoffman and his wife Yvette were shot and wounded.

title: Sarkozy stripped of Legion of Honor
subhead: The decision to revoke the country's highest distinction was expected since Sarkozy's conviction for graft. President Emmanuel Macron said he was opposed to the move.

title: Philosopher Emanuele Coccia and designer Alessandro Michele believe fashion deserves a place in the world of ideas. Here's why
subhead: Clothing has long been dismissed or overlooked by most thinkers. In 'The Life of Forms,' Coccia and Michele establish an interesting dialogue, demonstrating the transformative power of a discipline far more profound than it may seem.

title: How Greenland tries to avoid the over-tourism trap
subhead: As the territory with a population of 56,500 prepares to welcome a record number of visitors this year, the Parliament has passed a law designed to encourage local businesses and limit the arrival of large cruise ships.

title: Thomas Piketty: 'Opponents of the tax on the ultra-wealthy lack historical perspective'
subhead: After France's Sénat voted against a 2% wealth tax for people whose worth exceeds €100 million, the economist argues that the scale of France's debt and funding needs for social and climate challenges will soon require even more radical redistributive measures.
